review_text: very poor service and lack of communication. This bank also seems to be stuck in the 1990s. Forcing people to come in person (which for someone with 2 babies is not the easiest) when other banks are changing to cater their clients needs Ion continues to drop the ball. In person is a long and slow experience with people unable to properly do their job which speaks volumes on a complete lack of training. The mortgage department also fails to listen to their clients needs and choose their own dates for when payments are processed. I strongly suggest choosing other mortgage brokers before Ion Bank.
Great bank! It's nice to have a banking option with a definite small feel to it and have the 'big bank' features for customers. Ion Bank has been able to do this for me for 15 years!

Had this bank for 51 years never any trouble 
always happy to help whenever needed.
